about_the_game:
※If you want to use this content, you must own the full version of the game.

※Limited to one purchase per account.

※ DLC is non-refundable

※In the Game Click the "Menu" button in the upper right corner of the Mainpage-->Click the "Claim DLC" button-->Check your Mailbox

This content contains the following.

  • Venus Fragment x 50

  • 11-Basic Summon Ticket x1

content_descriptors.notes: The Mature content appears from the start, in the tutorial as well as in menus and in events. The characters are depicted in a consensual sexual relationship or positions that are lewd or depict sexual interactions, such as masturbation or various fetishes.

name: Project QT - Venus Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Additional Notes: Internet required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Internet required

short_description: To play this content, you must own the game's main program Project QT on Steam. Get Venus Fragments and more!
supported_languages:
English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
